game.name: Grave Keeper
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You are The Bounty Hunter and walked into The Forbidden Stronghold. It is taken by The Skeleton King. To collect all treasures you must kill him first.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are The Bounty Hunter and walked into The Forbidden Stronghold. It is taken by The Skeleton King. To collect all treasures you must kill him first.
